title: Nitish Kumar snaps at-dmks TR Baalu for-seeking speech translation
selftext:
https://www.indiatoday.in/india/story/india-bloc-alliance-meet-nitish-kumar-snaps-at-dmks-tr-baalu-for-seeking-speech-translation-2478167-2023-12-20

Ridiculous. I had some hopes from Nitish maybe he should have been the leader of the opposition. Horrible, considering the fact that he went to an NIT and got educated. Shameful!
